name: Camp Imaginate
description: This camp is open to all San Francisco youth in grades 6-12, with a special focus on young people with disabilities. Explore painting & drawing, ceramics, fiber arts, and digital media. Celebrate your hard work and creativity in an epic exhibition of student projects at the end of every session! Camp highlights for parents: - Accessibility and Inclusion: Camp Imaginate is welcoming to all youth, including those with disabilities and English learners. - Aligned with Standards: Our curriculum is g
